title: Multiquip Whiteman MC3PEA - Mixer-Conc Poly Drum 115V elec 3cf

description.technical:
- Model: MC3PEA
- Drum Capacity: 3 cubic feet
- Power Source: 115V electric motor
- Drum Type: Polyethylene
- Weight: Approximately 150 lbs
- Dimensions: Compact and portable design for easy transport
- Applications: Ideal for small to medium concrete jobs, including sidewalks, patios, and foundation work.
description.usage: The Multiquip Whiteman MC3PEA is perfect for contractors and DIY enthusiasts who need a reliable mixer for small-scale concrete projects. Its durable polyethylene drum prevents rust and makes cleanup effortless. The compact design and electric motor allow for seamless operation in tight spaces.
description.notes: Always follow safety guidelines while operating. Requires a 115V power source. Delivery and pickup services are available upon request.
